name: Two Atmospheric Atrocities
description:
These are two small projects I first made a while ago for a now defunct project. I polished them up for the Haunted PS1 Summer Spooks Jam found here. 

Neither game has a goal or ending; they are just little atmospheric pieces. Have fun or die!  don't!

---------------------------------------------------------

GAME 1 CONTROLS:

Move - Left Click

Interact - Left Click

---------------------------------------------------------

GAME 2 CONTROLS:

Move - WASD (Tank)

Interact - E

---------------------------------------------------------

Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/BryceBucher

---------------------------------------------------------
